::Najah/Feline2::

The snake Dificulty avoid the shots and he was flewing around Trying 
to avoid the rocket.

Feline didn't loose time and  using her weapon she shot and destroyed 
the rocket.

One of the pieces of the rocket hurted Najah, forced him to do a 
forced land.   

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Najah::
> 
> The snake avoid the shot and he scream to Repressor "The ROCKET... 
> DESTROY THE ROCKET... "
> 
> The snake passed quickly in front of Repressor Followed by the 
Rocket.
> 
> Najah c--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Repressor::
> >

> trasforming 
> > into vehicle mode and launching off at full speed. He could see 
the 
> > battle between Najah and the Maximal from a distance. He could 
also 
> > hear HotRod's boasts.
> >

bot.
